all_text_content:
Verse of the Day
I came unto mine own, and mine own received me not; but unto as many as received me gave I power to do many miracles, and to become the sons of God; and even unto them that believed on my name gave I power to obtain eternal life.
Doctrine and Covenants 45:8
Quote of the Day
"Praying to Heavenly Father helped me know who He is and my relationship with Him—that I was His beloved spirit son."
Takashi Wada | 1 Oct 2024General Conference
